TopicTitle: My little Challenge: Get anywhere with a Small rocket.

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone. I like to challenge myself and Here I've done an example of it.

My goal is to build a rocket that can get anywhere in the Kerbal system, but the rocket itself must be below 40-50 parts

In the right conditions, I was able to make this rocket get up to about 3 time farther than Jool. So I decided to make my First video about a Landing on Duna.

Here it is

Part 1. Duna

If you want to challenge yourself, Here's the rules.

1. This is a Stock Only challenge. It would be too easy with modded parts like Warp drives.

2. You must take the least time as possible. My record was 324D 5H 31M. But I didn't recorded it. As long you beat the one I made in this video.

(343D 3H 11M) I think.

3. You must use the least parts as possible. If possible, Less than 40 parts. ( in my video I have about 42 parts but it is overkill for Duna. It was designed to get everywhere in the kerbal system.)

4. A video proof is required.

Any gamemode allowed.

The rest is Coming Soon.

Edited July 21, 2014 by Pac0master
